scripts.up: yarn && lerna bootstrap && lerna run start --stream --scope linode-manager -- --color
scripts.docker:test: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'manager' && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/src/src manager test
scripts.docker:local: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'manager' && docker run -it --rm -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/src/src manager start
scripts.docker:storybook: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'storybook' && docker run -it --rm -p 6006:6006 -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/src/src storybook storybook
